【ADD JOY TO LIFE】DIY diamond painting can improve hands-on ability, reduce stress and ease emotions, experience a sense of accomplishment, enhance self-confidence and cultivate patience, suitable for adults, the elderly and children.
【MORE DIAMONDS】--We offer extra 30% drills for each diamond painting kit, all diamond painting are checked and weighed when they leave factory to make sure never be short of beads

description: Shiny diamond Sparkling diamonds, strong Dimensional, Perfect color match, pattern vivid image, never fade. We added 30% extra diamonds to solve the problem of losing diamonds during the production process High Quality HD Canvas with Clear Symbols The HD and waterproof canvas processed by 5D technology has clearer outlines and texture so that marked number can be easily found, promoting you quickly and accurately embed diamonds of the corresponding color on the canvas How To Diamond Paint: 1.Ready the diamond accessories tools 2. Find the diamond corresponding to the canvas. 3.Use the drill pen to take some glue at the top. 4.Put one color of drills into the plate,shake a few times . 5. Open the protect film and stick the drill on the canvas 6. When finished,please press the canvas under a book. Tips NOTE ?1. Do NOT expose too much unfinished area of canvas in case of viscosity reduction. ?2. To avoid creasing, do NOT fold the canvas. ?3. The diamond inedible, do not let children play in order to avoid accidents such as swallowing. ?4. The product not included the frame. It is just a rolled canvas. Please frame it by glasses or wooden and hang in your home as for decoration adornments ?5. It's a good idea to give friends and family to express good wishes to share. 10D DIY diamond painting can experience a sense of achievement.
